panels.description: Approximate application start based on the first CPU data point of the driver.
panels.title: Application Start

panels.description: Approximate application end based on the last CPU data point of the driver.
panels.title: Application End

panels.description: JVM Process CPU time, subsumes all JVM CPU activities like garbage collection, tasks CPU, ...
panels.title: Task JVM CPU Time

panels.description: Time spent on garbage collection on the executors
panels.title: Executors GC Time

panels.description: JVM Process CPU time for the driver, subsumes all JVM CPU activities like garbage collection, driver CPU, ...
panels.title: Driver JVM CPU Time

panels.description: Time spent on garbage collection on the driver
panels.title: Driver GC Time

panels.description: Shows memory usage per Spark memory compartment. See  https://g1thubhub.github.io/spark-memory.html for details.
panels.title: Executors Heap Memory Compartments

panels.description: Shows memory usage per Spark memory compartment. See  https://g1thubhub.github.io/spark-memory.html for details
panels.title: Executor OffHeap Memory Compartments

panels.description: Proportion of time spent on different executor activities. Spark's metric system does not expose IO metrics so the individual components may not always add up to 1.0. A custom SparkListener would be required for measuring Scan Time for example
panels.title: Executor Time Components

panels.description: The size of the serialized form of the shuffled data on disk
panels.title: Spill Size (Disk)

panels.description: The size of the deserialized form of the shuffled data in memory
panels.title: Spill Size (Memory)
